knuckle cracking.

	Woody said you could hurt your knuckles that way. Frasier went on this spiel about how it wasn't really your knuckles that were cracked and informed Woody it was harmless.

questions.text: Who did Carla say Rebecca looked like?
questions.explanation:
Sonny Bono.

	Sonny Bono was the husband of Cher. They were also a singing duo, and had their own variety tv show in the 60s. Rebecca thought that Carla was going to say she looked like Cher, but Carla, always with the insults, said she looked like Sonny Bono.

questions.text: What kind of earrings was Carla wearing?
questions.explanation:
little bananas.

	Norm commented that he liked her earrings and said they looked real. He then asked if they were real little bananas. Rebecca was kind of put out because she was wearing real diamond earrings and Norm was more interested in Carla's than in hers.

questions.text: When Rebecca said her date had an emergency by-pass what did Sam say?
questions.correct: "Yeah, he had to by pass you."
options: "What a shame, now you have no one to go to the party with."
"He's probably just lying to get out of going with you."
questions.explanation:
"Yeah, he had to by pass you."

	Sam also got stood up for his date because she was sick. Rebecca retaliated by saying, "Yeah, sick of you."

questions.text: What would Rebecca rather do than go out with Sam?
questions.correct: Remove her own gallbladder with an oyster fork
options: Remove her own kidney with a salad fork
Remove her own gallbladder with an oyster fork
Be run over by a mack truck
questions.explanation:
Remove her own gallbladder with an oyster fork.

	Sam thought it would be a good idea for him and Rebecca to go together since they both lost their dates. Rebecca didn't want to go with him because she simply was not interested in Sam despite his many come-ons.

questions.text: Who played the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff?
questions.explanation:
Admiral J. Crowe, Jr.

	Admiral Crowe was the real Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff at the time and played himself. He held this position from 1985-1989. The Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff is the highest ranking military officer in the United States Air Force.

	Rebecca thought that the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff stole them. She said, "But he looked like such a nice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff."

questions.text: Who was upset that someone was accused of stealing?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff really liked the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and found it preposterous that anyone would accuse him of stealing. Later on however, he found out that the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff wanted to get out of the bar before running into "that mailman" again. Cliff decided he was guilty of stealing.

questions.text: What did Rebecca agree to do if Sam found the missing item(s)?
questions.explanation:
Sleep with him.

	Rebecca said she was so desperate to get the earrings back that she would do anything, even sleep with Sam. Sam found the earrings but they didn't end up sleeping together because Rebecca was so unenthusiastic about it.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say Sam was?
questions.explanation:
"Definite maybe".

	Rebecca said when she met a guy she put him in one of three categories, yes, no or maybe. She then said that when she saw Sam Malone she thought "God no." Then Sam kissed her and when he left the office she said "Definite maybe" which Sam overheard. She tried to cover it up by saying she said other things that rhyme, such as "I think you gave me rabies."
